list.historyEntry: sudo gem uninstall cocoapods Password: Gem 'cocoapods' is not installed

I get errors when trying to run ios in flutter Warning: CocoaPods is installed but broken. Skipping pod install. You appear to have CocoaPods installed but it is not working. This can happen if the version of Ruby that CocoaPods was installed with is different from the one being used to invoke it. This can usually be fixed by re-installing CocoaPods. For re-installation instructions, see https://guides.cocoapods.org/using/getting-started.html#installation
CocoaPods not installed or not in valid state. Error launching application on iPhone 15.
